testsuite.test:
alert simple
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see an alert pop up, with a message in it?

alert two lines
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see an alert pop up, with a TWO LINE message?

alert long text
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did you see an alert pop up, with a long message which was still completely readable (e.g. properly wrapped and not cut off)?

confirm positive
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

confirm negative
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

confirm long text
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

prompt type in yes
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

prompt click OK
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

prompt long text
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Was the text in the pop up completely readable?

prompt multiple prompts
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

prompt click Cancel
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

prompt Hide virtual keyboard and re open
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
